top_comments.comment: This is such a sick and unique track, I've never heard anything like this on NCS before. This has been such an amazing journey and I'm so glad I got to listen to all the album along the way. Can't believe it's come to an end with this monster of a tune, and can't wait to see what's next in store for NCS!! very good ncs

Circle color meaning:

Red  = Drumstep
Orange  = Indie Dance
Yellow  = House/Electro
Green  = Trap
Mint  = Glitch Hop
Turquoise  = Melodic Dubstep/Chillstep
Blue  = Dubstep/Brostep
Purple  = Future House/Deep House
Magenta  = Drum & Bass
White  = EDM/Hardstyle/Miscellaneous Genre
Black  = Miscellaneous Genre
Saw this and spreading around  (Don't need likes)
I played this during Trick or Treating in black with purge masks, same with all my other friends..
